name: FuzzFeed Writer
description:
FuzzFeed Writer is a short clicker game for spring 2022's Clicker Jam where you take on the role of a writer for FuzzFeed: The Internet's Most Trusted News Source.

With each FuzzFeed article you 'write,' you get a commission which you can use to boost your WPM (words per minute) to further your writing speed and raise your commission.
